verses.verse: וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> vai-yis-Sa went on יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko Then Jacob רַגְלָ֑יו <WH7272> rag-Lav; his journey וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech and came אַ֥רְצָה <WH776> 'Ar-tzah into the land בְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the people קֶֽדֶם׃ <WH6924> Ke-dem. of the east

וַיַּ֞רְא <WH7200> vai-Yar And he looked וְהִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold בְאֵ֣ר <WH875> ve-'Er and behold a well בַּשָּׂדֶ֗ה <WH7704> bas-sa-Deh, in the field וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> ve-hin-neh- and behold שָׁ֞ם <WH8033> sham there שְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <WH7969> she-lo-Shah and lo there [were] three עֶדְרֵי־ <WH5739> 'ed-rei- flocks צֹאן֙ <WH6629> tzoN of sheep רֹבְצִ֣ים <WH7257> roe-Tzim lying עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-ha, beside כִּ֚י <WH3588> ki for מִן־ <WH4480> min- that הַבְּאֵ֣ר <WH875> hab-be-'Er by it for out of that well הַהִ֔וא <WH1931> ha-Hiv, they יַשְׁק֖וּ <WH8248> yash-Ku they watered הָעֲדָרִ֑ים <WH5739> ha-'a-da-Rim; the flocks וְהָאֶ֥בֶן <WH68> ve-ha-'E-ven stone גְּדֹלָ֖ה <WH1419> ge-do-Lah and a great עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- beside פִּ֥י <WH6310> pi mouth הַבְּאֵֽר׃ <WH875> hab-be-'Er. [was] upon the well's

וְנֶאֶסְפוּ־ <WH622> ve-ne-'es-fu- gathered שָׁ֣מָּה <WH8033> Sham-mah there כָל־ <WH3605> chol all הָעֲדָרִ֗ים <WH5739> ha-'a-da-Rim, And thither were all the flocks וְגָלֲל֤וּ <WH1556> ve-ga-la-Lu and they rolled אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאֶ֙בֶן֙ <WH68> ha-'E-ven the stone מֵעַל֙ <WH5921> me-'Al from פִּ֣י <WH6310> pi mouth הַבְּאֵ֔ר <WH875> hab-be-'Er, from the well's וְהִשְׁק֖וּ <WH8248> ve-hish-Ku and watered אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַצֹּ֑אן <WH6629> hatz-Tzon; the sheep וְהֵשִׁ֧יבוּ <WH7725> ve-he-Shi-vu again אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאֶ֛בֶן <WH68> ha-'E-ven the stone עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on פִּ֥י <WH6310> pi mouth הַבְּאֵ֖ר <WH875> hab-be-'Er upon the well's לִמְקֹמָֽהּ׃ <WH4725> lim-ko-Mah. in his place

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said לָהֶם֙ la-Hem יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko, And Jacob אַחַ֖י <WH251> 'a-Chai unto them My brethren מֵאַ֣יִן <WH370> me-'A-yin whence אַתֶּ֑ם <WH859> 'at-Tem; and they וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> vai-Yo-me-Ru, [be] ye;And they said מֵחָרָ֖ן <WH2771> me-cha-Ran Of Haran אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <WH587> 'a-Na-che-nu. we

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, הַיְדַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> hay-da'-Tem unto them Know אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- לָבָ֣ן <WH3837> la-Van ye Laban בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son נָח֑וֹר <WH5152> na-Chor; Nahor וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru said יָדָֽעְנוּ׃ <WH3045> ya-Da-'e-nu. We know

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem הֲשָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> ha-sha-Lom [He is] well ל֑וֹ lo; וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru said שָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> sha-Lom, is well וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and here רָחֵ֣ל <WH7354> ra-Chel and behold Rachel בִּתּ֔וֹ <WH1323> bit-To, his daughter בָּאָ֖ה <WH935> ba-'Ah cometh עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with הַצֹּֽאן׃ <WH6629> hatz-Tzon. with the sheep

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer, And he said הֵ֥ן <WH2005> hen Lo עוֹד֙ <WH5750> 'Od is still הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom day גָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol, [it is] yet high לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- is not עֵ֖ת <WH6256> 'et neither [is it] time הֵאָסֵ֣ף <WH622> he-'a-Sef should be gathered together הַמִּקְנֶ֑ה <WH4735> ham-mik-Neh; that the cattle הַשְׁק֥וּ <WH8248> hash-Ku water הַצֹּ֖אן <WH6629> hatz-Tzon ye the sheep וּלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> u-le-Chu and go רְעֽוּ׃ <WH7462> re-'U. [and] feed

עוֹדֶ֖נּוּ <WH5750> o-Den-nu And while he yet מְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> me-dab-Ber spake עִמָּ֑ם <WH5973> 'im-Mam; them וְרָחֵ֣ל׀ <WH7354> ve-ra-Chel with them Rachel בָּ֗אָה <WH935> Ba-'ah, came עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with הַצֹּאן֙ <WH6629> hatz-tzoN sheep אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after לְאָבִ֔יהָ <WH1> le-'a-Vi-ha, with her father's כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for רֹעָ֖ה <WH7462> ro-'Ah for she kept them הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> hi he

וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> vay-Hi become כִשְׁמֹ֨עַ <WH8085> chish-Mo-a' heard לָבָ֜ן <WH3837> la-Van And it came to pass when Laban אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שֵׁ֣מַע׀ <WH8088> She-ma' the tidings יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko of Jacob בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- son אֲחֹת֗וֹ <WH269> a-cho-To, his sister's וַיָּ֤רָץ <WH7323> vai-Ya-rotz that he ran לִקְרָאתוֹ֙ <WH7125> lik-ra-To to meet וַיְחַבֶּק־ <WH2263> vay-chab-bek- him and embraced לוֹ֙ lo וַיְנַשֶּׁק־ <WH5401> vay-nash-shek- him and kissed ל֔וֹ lo, וַיְבִיאֵ֖הוּ <WH935> vay-vi-'E-hu him and brought אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> bei-To; him to his house וַיְסַפֵּ֣ר <WH5608> vay-sap-Per And he told לְלָבָ֔ן <WH3837> le-la-Van, Laban אֵ֥ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim all these things הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> ha-'El-leh. these

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said לוֹ֙ lo לָבָ֔ן <WH3837> la-Van, And Laban אַ֛ךְ <WH389> 'ach to him Surely עַצְמִ֥י <WH6106> 'atz-Mi thou [art] my bone וּבְשָׂרִ֖י <WH1320> u-ve-sa-Ri and my flesh אָ֑תָּה <WH859> 'At-tah; and he וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> vai-Ye-shev And he abode עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> im-Mo with חֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> Cho-desh of a month יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> ya-Mim. with him the space

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said לָבָ֗ן <WH3837> la-Van, And Laban ט֚וֹב <WH2896> Tov [It is] better תִּתִּ֣י <WH5414> tit-Ti that I give אֹתָ֣הּ <WH853> 'o-Tah לָ֔ךְ Lach, מִתִּתִּ֥י <WH5414> mit-tit-Ti her to thee than that I should give אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> 'o-Tah לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH582> le-'Ish her to אַחֵ֑ר <WH312> 'a-Cher; her to another שְׁבָ֖ה <WH3427> she-Vah abide עִמָּדִֽי׃ <WH5978> 'im-ma-Di. against
